Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.rules

Class DecoratedRule

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.rules.DecoratedRule
All Implemented Interfaces:
Rule, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionRule, ExchangeRule, InfluenceRule, MotherNatureRule, ProfessorRule
public abstract class DecoratedRule extends Object implements Serializable, Rule
The class DecoratedRule is inherited by all the Rules that are not the DefaultRules and that modify the behaviour of some aspects of the game, in particular reimplement (override) the methods of the interface Rule
